title: Level 2: Connection
description: For FRIENDS. Dig deeper. Ask the questions you usually avoid and strengthen your bond.

cards.content: What is the last lie you told?
cards.back: Who did you tell it to?

cards.content: What is a feeling you miss?
What is the hardest truth you've had to accept about yourself?
Who in your life do you feel most yourself around?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Write a note to the other person. Don't let them read it until they leave.

cards.content: What is a pain you are currently healing from?
cards.back: You don't have to share details if you don't want to.

cards.content: What is your biggest fear regarding our friendship?
When was the last time you felt truly proud of yourself?
What is a dream you've let go of?
cards.back: Why did you let it go?

cards.content: If you could apologize to one person, who would it be?
What part of your life do you feel is currently missing?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Give the other person a genuine compliment you've never said before.

cards.content: Are you holding onto a grudge?
What is the biggest mistake you've made in the last year?
Do you think you are easy or hard to love?
What is something you wish you could tell your parents?
When was the last time you cried?
What is one thing you need to forgive yourself for?
What is the most misunderstood thing about you?
Who is someone you miss, but don't talk to anymore?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Scroll to the first photo of us together on your phone. Show it.

cards.content: What is a compliment you struggle to accept?
If you died tomorrow, what would be your biggest regret?
What is something you are currently procrastinating?
Do you feel like you are where you're supposed to be in life?
What is a habit you are trying to break?
What makes you feel lonely?
What is the nicest thing anyone has ever done for you?
How have you changed in the last year?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Admit one thing you admire about the other person.

cards.content: What is a question you are afraid to ask me?
Are you happy with who you are becoming?
What keeps you up at night?
If you could change one thing about your childhood, what would it be?
What is something you take for granted?
What is the best advice you've ever received?
What is something you lied about to protect someone's feelings?
When do you feel most beautiful?
What is a boundary you need to set?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Hug for 20 seconds. If not comfortable, high five.

cards.content: What is something you pretend to understand but don't?
What is your definition of success?
What is something you want to be remembered for?
Who was your first heartbreak?
What is something you are envious of?
If you could have a conversation with anyone living or dead, who?
What is one thing you would change about our friendship?
Do you think we will be friends in 10 years?
What is the most brave thing you have ever done?
What is a smell that triggers a memory for you?
Who was your favorite teacher and why?
What is the most physical pain you've ever felt?
Have you ever seen a ghost?
What is a song that makes you cry?
What is your definition of a 'good life'?
When do you feel most lonely?
What is something you are proud of but never talk about?
What is the biggest risk you've ever taken?
If you could change your name, what would it be?
What is something you need to let go of?
